properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 12:19PM PST until February 10 at 1:48PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Washington...Oregon...

Walla Walla River near Touchet affecting Walla Walla County
Umatilla River near Gibbon affecting Umatilla County
Umatilla River at Pendleton affecting Umatilla County

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon...
Washington..
Grande Ronde River near Perry affecting Union County
Grande Ronde River at Troy affecting Wallowa and Asotin Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Walla Walla River near Touchet.
* until Monday afternoon.
* At 11:30 AM Friday, the stage was 19.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Major flooding is occurring and Major flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 19.8 feet by late
this afternoon. The river is expected to fall below flood
stage Monday.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown. Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility
vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow
for safe passage. As little as one foot of water on the road can move
most vehicles off the road.


Additional information is available at:
weather.gov/Pendleton
